data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_1_1
data.value: Hold {0}, and press a key to use a move.\nYou must use at least one move on an enemy Pokmon if you want to gain EXP from it.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_1_2
data.value: All moves and Pokmon have a type, such as Fire, Water, or Grass. There's 18 in all!\nUse a move that has a type-advantage against the enemy to do more damage.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_1_3
data.value: Some Pokmon have two types that can cover each other's weaknesses.\nUse a move that has an advantage against both for exceptional damage!

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_2_1
data.value: Physical moves use your Attack and the opponent's Defense, while Special moves use your Special Attack and the opponent's Special Defense.\nThese stats can be temporarily modified: boosted or lowered by up to 6 stages.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_2_2
data.value: With a higher Speed stat your attacks are more likely to hit, and foes are less likely to hit you.\nThese chances are also affected by temporary Accuracy and Evasion modifiers: boosted or lowered by up to 6 stages.\nJust remember: if you ever miss an attack, the next one is sure to hit!

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_2_3
data.value: Movement Speed differs from the Speed stat! Normally you move once per turn, but being sped up can let you move more than once. If you're slowed down, you will skip a turn each time you move.\nAttack speed is unaffected by all this; your turn always ends if you attack, and you never skip turns if slowed. Movement Speed can be temporarily boosted or lowered by up to 3 stages.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_3_1
data.value: There are 5 major status ailments: Sleep, Poison, Paralysis, Burn, and Freeze.\nIf you're under the effects of one, you cannot be affected by the other.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_3_2
data.value: There are many minor status ailments, such as Confusion and Leech Seed.\nThey can all affect a target at the same time.\nCheck your team member's Statuses page if you've lost track of them.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_3_3
data.value: Every Pokmon has an ability, which can make it immune to certain status, inflict status on opponents when attacked, or provide other beneficial effects.\nCheck your team member's Info page to read about its ability.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_4_1
data.value: Within dungeons, you will find various traps scattered on the floor.\nThey can be triggered by stepping on them, or by targeting them with certain attacks.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_4_2
data.value: Use your {0} attack to reveal traps directly in front of you. Traps won't trigger this way, either.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_4_3
data.value: Most traps will affect anyone within their range, while some will only target the Pokmon that triggered it! Lead enemies into them while avoiding them yourself.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_5_1
data.value: Hold {0} to turn in place, and hold {1} to move diagonally.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_5_2
data.value: Press {0}+{1} to skip your turn. You can use this to wait and heal from natural HP regeneration.\nMovement and combat in dungeons is always turn-based. Enemies won't move until you do, so take your time to plan accordingly.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_5_3
data.value: Press {0},{1},{2} or {3} to switch the team leader. This can be done without taking any turns.

data.name: SIGN_TUTORIAL_5_4
data.value: Press {0} to switch on Team Mode. With this, you can control the entire team, turn-by-turn.

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_EXP
data.value: The Pokmon here are really weak.[pause=0] I can take them out with my regular attack.[br]But if I never use my moves,[pause=0] I wont gain experience points for winning...

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_FADED
data.value: O,[pause=20] forgotten road,[pause=20] relic of times long go-one \u266A[pause=0]\nO,[pause=20] forgotten road,[pause=20] you remain here alo-one \u266A[br]O,[pause=20] forgotten road,[pause=20] that I travel alo-ong \u266A[pause=0]\nSoon,[pause=20] you'll fade away,[pause=20] but I'll remember you \u266A

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_MISS
data.value: The higher your Speed stat, the easier it is to hit and dodge attacks.[br]If your opponents speed is higher than yours, youll miss more often.[br]But always remember...[br]No matter how hard it is to hit your target,[pause=0] you can never miss twice in a row.

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_NEUTRAL
data.value: Be careful around wild Pokmon when you're in these Mystery Dungeons.[br]But me?[pause=0] I'm harmless.[br]You can tell from the color of my map icon,[pause=0] and the yellow outline around my shadow!

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_POISON
data.value: If you get poisoned, don't panic![scroll]Wait it out without moving or attacking, and you'll take less damage.

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_PYRAMID
data.value: The heart of the desert lies in its borders...[pause=0]\nFour corners reveal the path to the center.

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_QUARRY
data.value: [tmp]Darn, I still couldn't find it...[br]They said the secret passage was supposed to be in the quarry, where the floors were still brown.

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_RANGE
data.value: I'd be careful around those Ledyba...[br]Their Supersonic hits at a long range,[pause=0] and can travel through multiple team members!

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_RECRUIT
data.value: Have you found any Apricorns?[pause=0] Their distinct aroma can pacify hostile Pokmon.[br]Toss one at them,[pause=0] and you might make a friend!

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_STAT_CLEAR
data.value: Whew, that did the trick![pause=0] Why don't you take this?

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_STAT_DROP
data.value: Aurgh, that Aipom threw some sand in my eyes and now my aim is off![br]I need to get to a Wonder Tile...

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_STAT_DROP_CLEAR
data.value: Whew,[pause=0] no more sand in my eyes![pause=0] Thank you so much![br]By the way,[pause=30] if you ever lose track of your stat changes,[pause=0] check the Statuses page on the Team Menu.

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_SWITCH_GAMEPAD
data.value: If you want another Pokmon to take the lead, use {0} or {1} to switch leaders!

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_SWITCH_KEYBOARD
data.value: If you want another Pokmon to take the lead, use {0}, {1}, {2} or {3} to switch leaders!

data.name: TALK_ADVICE_TEAM_MODE
data.value: If youre in a situation where every teammates move counts, use {0} to activate Team Mode.[br]In Team Mode, you can command every teammate directly.

data.name: TALK_CANT
data.value: [myname] can't talk just now.

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_ASK
data.value: Take the lost Pokmon along?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_BROTHER_ACCEPT
data.value: [tmp]Can you get me out of here?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_BROTHER_FULL_001
data.value: [tmp]I.. I have no arms...

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_BROTHER_HALF
data.value: [tmp]Why is this place so dangerous?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_BROTHER_PINCH
data.value: [tmp]It hurts so much...

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_BROTHER_START
data.value: [tmp]Help... help!

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_FATHER_ACCEPT
data.value: [tmp]Do you know the way out?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_FATHER_FULL_001
data.value: [tmp]Everything's so unfamiliar... But I'm determined to survive.

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_FATHER_HALF
data.value: [tmp]This is nothing, I've lived through a war.

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_FATHER_PINCH
data.value: [tmp]Augh... It's too much...

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_FATHER_START
data.value: [tmp]Who are you? What is this place?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_GRANDMA_ACCEPT
data.value: [tmp]My family... they're waiting for me?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_GRANDMA_FULL_001
data.value: [tmp]This place... it's so familiar...

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_GRANDMA_HALF
data.value: [tmp]Wait for me!

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_GRANDMA_PINCH
data.value: [tmp]I feel unwell...

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_GRANDMA_START
data.value: [tmp]Where am I...?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_MOTHER_ACCEPT
data.value: [tmp]A rescue team? Can you help me get out?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_MOTHER_FULL_001
data.value: [tmp]I'm worried about my daughter...

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_MOTHER_HALF
data.value: [tmp]It hurts...

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_MOTHER_PINCH
data.value: [tmp]No...

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_MOTHER_START
data.value: [tmp]My baby! Where is my baby?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_PET_ACCEPT
data.value: [tmp]Hey! Are we going somewhere?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_PET_FULL_001
data.value: [tmp]Why is everyone afraid of me?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_PET_HALF
data.value: [tmp]Owwwh, savage!

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_PET_PINCH
data.value: [tmp]Grr.... Not giving up...

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_PET_START
data.value: [tmp]Woof! Woof![br]Surprise! Not everyone who got isekai'd to the Pokemon world was human!

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_SISTER_ACCEPT
data.value: Can... can you get me out of here?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_SISTER_FULL_001
data.value: [tmp]This can't be real...

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_SISTER_FULL_002
data.value: [tmp]This feels so strange...

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_SISTER_FULL_003
data.value: [tmp]H-Hey... what are you?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_SISTER_HALF
data.value: [tmp]Owie! Why is everyone so mean!?

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_SISTER_PINCH
data.value: [tmp]I can't go on...

data.name: TALK_ESCORT_SISTER_START
data.value: [tmp]Where am I? Am I dreaming? I feel a slight breeze...

data.name: TALK_FULL_0000
data.value: Let's do our best!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0001
data.value: Let's help each other do well!

data.name: TALK_FULL_0002
data.value: Let's take this challenge on nice and steady.

data.name: TALK_FULL_0003

data.name: TALK_HALF_0173
data.value: It's OK. We can ride this out!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0175
data.value: IT'S MERELY A SCRATCH. NOTHING WORTH CONCERN!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0176
data.value: I HAVE ONLY SLIGHT DAMAGE. IT IS NOTHING.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0177
data.value: THIS LEVEL OF DAMAGE? NOT WORTH YOUR ATTENTION!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0178
data.value: YOUR WORRY IS NEEDLESS. ABOVE ALL ELSE, WE MUST PUSH ON.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0180
data.value: THE WOUND IS SHALLOW. YOUR CONCERN IS UNWARRANTED.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0181
data.value: IT IS NO MORE THAN A SCRATCH. LET US CONTINUE.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0182
data.value: I SEEM TO HAVE TAKEN DAMAGE. IT'S OF NO CONCERN.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0183
data.value: THIS DAMAGE? TRIVIAL. I AM INVINCIBLE!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0185
data.value: PROGRESS... COMPROMISED...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0186
data.value: I AM FINE... WORRY...NOT...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0187
data.value: I AM...PAINED... I AM...PAINED...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0188
data.value: SUSTAINED...SOME DAMAGE... SUSTAINED...SOME DAMAGE...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0190
data.value: It appears that I have sustained some damage...

data.name: TALK_HALF_0191
data.value: You didn't seriously imagine that I would be impeded by this?

data.name: TALK_HALF_0192
data.value: My wound is merely superficial. There is no need to fear.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0193
data.value: I will be fine as long as my damage stays this minimal.

data.name: TALK_HALF_0195
data.value: It's now a tad unfriendly here!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0196
data.value: Oh no! Oh no! My health has declined!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0197
data.value: Oh no! Oh no! I've suffered damage!

data.name: TALK_HALF_0198
data.value: Our journey might be spoiled. \u266A But I remain game! \u266A

data.name: TALK_HALF_0200
data.value: It's gotten even tougher now.

data.name: TALK_OUTLAW_DISGUISE_001
data.value: [tmp]Hey it's me, manager. I'm okay after all!

data.name: TALK_OUTLAW_DISGUISE_002
data.value: [tmp]Don't worry, I'll be right back on the mountain, kekeke...

data.name: TALK_OUTLAW_DISGUISE_003
data.value: [tmp]I said you should go now. There's nothing here for you.

data.name: TALK_OUTLAW_DISGUISE_004
data.value: [tmp]fufufu... so you're not fooled after all.

data.name: TALK_OUTLAW_DISGUISE_005
data.value: [tmp]Fine, we'll do this the hard way!

data.name: TALK_OUTLAW_DISGUISE_ATTACKED
data.value: [tmp]What? How!?

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0000
data.value: I'm going down for the count...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0001
data.value: Please help me, [player]... I'm about to keel over...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0002
data.value: Ugh... I don't want to faint in a place like this...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0005
data.value: Ugh... I'm in considerable pain...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0006
data.value: Help me, please, [player]...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0007
data.value: I'm feeling faint...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0010
data.value: I can't take any more... I want to go home...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0011
data.value: Please... Please, don't leave me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0012
data.value: H-h-help...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0015
data.value: I might not make it... It'll be all up to you then, [player]...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0016
data.value: Urk... Help me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0017
data.value: Oh, blast... This might be it...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0020
data.value: It's gone from bad to worse...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0021
data.value: Ugh, no... Not a place like this...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0022
data.value: Ugh... Is this to be my...final adventure?

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0025
data.value: Never! I won't allow myself to be felled! Not in a place like this!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0026
data.value: N-n-no... N-n-never... I won't give up...until my last breath...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0027
data.value: Not...yet... No...NOT now... NO!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0030
data.value: Major...stress... Major...stress...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0031
data.value: Help... Help... Please... Help, [player]...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0032
data.value: Keeping up... All I can do... keeping up...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0035
data.value: Gah! My vision is blurry!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0036
data.value: Gah! This shouldn't be happening! Not to me!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0037
data.value: Ugh... Gah... Go on... Go on without me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0040
data.value: Ow-wow-ow! Why's all this pain coming my way?

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0041
data.value: Urk... Ack... I'm badly hurt...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0042
data.value: Ack... Erk... You gotta heal me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0045
data.value: Oooh... [player]... I just can't go on...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0046
data.value: If something happens to me... You have to carry on...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0047
data.value: Help, [player]... Feel faint...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0050
data.value: Ack! Ack! No way! I'm going out in a blaze of glory!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0051
data.value: Never! Never! I won't give up until the bitter end!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0052
data.value: Ha-ha! Ack! Come on! I'll take it all on!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0055
data.value: Uh-uh-yup...I'm...almost done...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0056
data.value: Uh-uh-yup...not doing well... Heal me, will you...?

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0057
data.value: Just...just wish I could make it back home...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0060
data.value: Gotta have guts... Ugh...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0061
data.value: You go, [player]... Forget about me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0062
data.value: Keep...fighting...until the END...!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0065
data.value: I'm pretty run down...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0066
data.value: Now if things get much worse, [player], you just go on without me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0067
data.value: Gasp... Gasp... I'm not...giving up until the end...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0070
data.value: Yeah...yeah...I'm beat up bad...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0071
data.value: This lousy place...won't be the last place I ever see...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0072
data.value: Ha! No! You're not seriously worried about...me...? What a buddy...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0075
data.value: Ooooh... Don't let me slow you...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0076
data.value: I'm...just fine...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0077
data.value: Oh, [player]...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0080
data.value: Bah...it's too much...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0081
data.value: Heal me. You need to heal me. Please, [player]...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0082
data.value: Keeping... Keeping... Just keeping up is all...I can manage...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0135
data.value: Can't...can't...I can't...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0136
data.value: Oh, it h-h-hurts...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0137
data.value: Awful...awful...awful!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0138
data.value: F-f-fainting...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0139
data.value: No...more...no...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0145
data.value: Terribly bad... Just terrible...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0146
data.value: My spirit is nearly broken... Please restore me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0147
data.value: I can b-b-barely stay upright...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0148
data.value: I just...won't be able to continue for much...longer...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0149
data.value: This is...certainly...the end for me... Do help!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0160
data.value: Ha... Ha... It h-h-hurts...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0161
data.value: I've been taken down...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0162
data.value: It's too hard to go on... Help...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0163
data.value: Be so kind as...to heal me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0165
data.value: N-n-no... My health...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0166
data.value: Took...too...much damage...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0167
data.value: I'll drop out if I'm not healed... Someone...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0168
data.value: I... I'm going to fall... Hurts...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0170
data.value: N-n-no! My health...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0171
data.value: I'm fainting... Someone...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0172
data.value: I took too much damage... Hurry, I need to heal...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0173
data.value: N-n-no more... I'm going down...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0175
data.value: NOT GOOD AT ALL...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0176
data.value: I WILL NOT...FAIL HERE!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0177
data.value: I WILL N-N-NOT FALL TO THIS!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0178
data.value: GRIEVOUS DAMAGE! BUT I REFUSE TO FALL!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0180
data.value: HOW DID I SUSTAIN SO MUCH DAMAGE?!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0181
data.value: IT PAINS ME...BUT I CAN TAKE MORE!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0182
data.value: FALL TO...THIS LEVEL OF DAMAGE? NO!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0183
data.value: I HAVE SUFFERED... MASSIVE DAMAGE... BUT I WILL NEVER FALL!

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0185
data.value: N-N-NO... BARELY... BARELY... CAN STAND...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0186
data.value: I PLEAD... HEAL ME... I PLEAD...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0187
data.value: A SAVAGE PATH... A SAVAGE PATH...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0188
data.value: IS THIS HOW... IS THIS HOW... I FALL...?

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0190
data.value: Gah! I've suffered more damage than I bargained for...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0191
data.value: I suffer...but there must be something that can be done...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0192
data.value: My health flickers and wanes... If left unhealed...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0193
data.value: My damage is not slight... Have I underestimated the challenge...?

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0195
data.value: Things are looking grim...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0196
data.value: I feel awfully faint... Please help me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0197
data.value: I'm at my limit...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0198
data.value: I am all but collapsing on my feet... Someone heal me...

data.name: TALK_PINCH_0200
data.value: I might be unable to go on...

data.name: TALK_REST_0001_VAR_00
data.value: Seeds are full of nutrition!

data.name: TALK_REST_0002_VAR_00
data.value: Large bulbs inspire happiness!

data.name: TALK_REST_0003_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: Flowers are blooming all over!

data.name: TALK_REST_0003_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: Onward!

data.name: TALK_REST_0004_VAR_00
data.value: The fire at the tip of my tail shows my energy!

data.name: TALK_REST_0005_VAR_00
data.value: Adventure! I'm fired up! My tail is burning, too!

data.name: TALK_REST_0006_VAR_00
data.value: Follow me!

data.name: TALK_REST_0007_VAR_00
data.value: I'm proud of my tough shell!

data.name: TALK_REST_0008_VAR_00
data.value: Taking good care of my tail is how I live so long!

data.name: TALK_REST_0009_VAR_00
data.value: Count on my water spouts!

data.name: TALK_REST_0010_VAR_00
data.value: Tree leaves are the yummiest, aren't they?

data.name: TALK_REST_0011_VAR_00
data.value: Harden!

data.name: TALK_REST_0012_VAR_00
data.value: My scales repel water, and that's how I can fly even in rain!

data.name: TALK_REST_0013_VAR_00
data.value: My red nose can find yummy leaves!

data.name: TALK_REST_0014_VAR_00
data.value: I won't budge! Not even a tiny bit!

data.name: TALK_REST_0015_VAR_00
data.value: I'm busy today! I'll be busy tomorrow! Bee!

data.name: TALK_REST_0016_VAR_00
data.value: Flapping wings, pid-pidgey! Pipipipidgey!

data.name: TALK_REST_0017_VAR_00
data.value: I have really good eyes! Respect my eyes!

data.name: TALK_REST_0018_VAR_00
data.value: I'm proud of my beautiful wings!

data.name: TALK_REST_0019_VAR_00
data.value: I'll be a great mason like my dad one day!

data.name: TALK_REST_0020_VAR_00
data.value: Ready to work another day!

data.name: TALK_REST_0021_VAR_00
data.value: I may look busy all the time... To tell you the truth...I AM busy all the time!

data.name: TALK_REST_0022_VAR_00
data.value: Look at my long beak!

data.name: TALK_REST_0023_VAR_00
data.value: I'm good at swallowing things whole! Do you want me to demonstrate?

data.name: TALK_REST_0024_VAR_00
data.value: I've seen other Arbok with different patterns from mine.

data.name: TALK_REST_0025_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: Pika with a big smile!

data.name: TALK_REST_0025_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: My cheeks and tail are what others find attractive! \u2661

data.name: TALK_REST_0026_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: Why is it so fun? Zap!

data.name: TALK_REST_0026_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: My electricity-storing pouches are making noise with static electricity!

data.name: TALK_REST_0027_VAR_00
data.value: I like to roll into a ball!

data.name: TALK_REST_0028_VAR_00
data.value: My moves can cut you in a flash!

data.name: TALK_REST_0029_VAR_00
data.value: I'll fight, too! Although I don't particularly like fighting!

data.name: TALK_REST_0030_VAR_00
data.value: Protecting my friends is my duty!

data.name: TALK_REST_0031_VAR_00
data.value: I'm really tough, so I can take any kind of attack!

data.name: TALK_REST_0032_VAR_00
data.value: I have good ears! I can hear everything!

data.name: TALK_REST_0033_VAR_00
data.value: I may not look it, but I'm tough! You better stay away!

data.name: TALK_REST_0034_VAR_00
data.value: My thick tail packs enormous power!

data.name: TALK_REST_0035_VAR_00
data.value: I love full-moon nights! Clef!

data.name: TALK_REST_0036_VAR_00
data.value: They call me a fairy! I wonder why? Could it be my fair personality?

data.name: TALK_REST_0037_VAR_00
data.value: Here I come! I'm Vulpix! \u266A I grow more tails as I grow! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0038_VAR_00
data.value: You must not touch my tails.

data.name: TALK_REST_0039_VAR_00
data.value: I love songs! \u266A Don't you? \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0040_VAR_00
data.value: My friendly friends! Hiya!

data.name: TALK_REST_0041_VAR_00
data.value: How long before it gets dark?

data.name: TALK_REST_0042_VAR_00
data.value: I feel like sinking my teeth into something...[pause=0] You know what I'm talking about?

data.name: TALK_REST_0043_VAR_00
data.value: It's such a nice day today!

data.name: TALK_REST_0044_VAR_00
data.value: When others have a gloomy day, I'm happy!

data.name: TALK_REST_0045_VAR_00
data.value: Here comes my pollen like an explosion!

data.name: TALK_REST_0046_VAR_00
data.value: May I offer one of the mushrooms on my back as a token of friendship?

data.name: TALK_REST_0047_VAR_00
data.value: I, the mushroom, have full control now!

data.name: TALK_REST_0048_VAR_00
data.value: I can shoot beams from my eyes! Cool, huh?

data.name: TALK_REST_0049_VAR_00
data.value: Scattering scales, I flap my wings!

data.name: TALK_REST_0050_VAR_00
data.value: I'm working on this adventure!

data.name: TALK_REST_0051_VAR_00
data.value: We aren't like this out of laziness! No way!

data.name: TALK_REST_0052_VAR_00
data.value: I like round things, meow!

data.name: TALK_REST_0053_VAR_00
data.value: Where to the nearest bank?

data.name: TALK_REST_0054_VAR_00
data.value: My head is always tormented. It hurts bad!

data.name: TALK_REST_0055_VAR_00
data.value: I'm good at swimming!

data.name: TALK_REST_0056_VAR_00
data.value: Mighty Mankey here has a short temper! I'm so frustrated!

data.name: TALK_REST_0057_VAR_00
data.value: This erupting rage is unstoppable!

data.name: TALK_REST_0058_VAR_00
data.value: Play with me! \u266A Graaaaw!

data.name: TALK_REST_0059_VAR_00
data.value: I swear on my mane that I'll fight fair and square!

data.name: TALK_REST_0060_VAR_00
data.value: I want to swim a lot and keep my skin moist! Poli!

data.name: TALK_REST_0061_VAR_00
data.value: Look at the spiral pattern on my belly!

data.name: TALK_REST_0062_VAR_00
data.value: I'm Poliwrath! I'm the boss of the river!

data.name: TALK_REST_0063_VAR_00
data.value: Zzz...

data.name: TALK_REST_0064_VAR_00
data.value: Alpha waves are radiating from all over my body!

data.name: TALK_REST_0065_VAR_00
data.value: If you desire my power, I'll help you as much as I can.

data.name: TALK_REST_0066_VAR_00
data.value: Muscle! Muscle!

data.name: TALK_REST_0067_VAR_00
data.value: I have to show off my muscles! Macho!

data.name: TALK_REST_0068_VAR_00
data.value: I can throw tons of punches in a matter of seconds! Take that!

data.name: TALK_REST_0069_VAR_00
data.value: I may look skinny, but I work just as hard as anyone else!

data.name: TALK_REST_0070_VAR_00
data.value: Other Pokmon's kindness touches me and makes me weep with joy!

data.name: TALK_REST_0071_VAR_00
data.value: Once in my mouth, anything delicious quickly drops into my belly!

data.name: TALK_REST_0072_VAR_00
data.value: I can shoot beams from my eyes! How cool is that?

data.name: TALK_REST_0073_VAR_00
data.value: Relaxing on the ocean surface is nice. It's so soothing, isn't it?

data.name: TALK_REST_0074_VAR_00
data.value: Whatever you do, don't throw me like a pebble!

data.name: TALK_REST_0075_VAR_00
data.value: I may not look it, but I'm an explorer! Gahahahaha!

data.name: TALK_REST_0076_VAR_00
data.value: I'm proud of my toughness!

data.name: TALK_REST_0077_VAR_00
data.value: I love hopping! Jump around with me!

data.name: TALK_REST_0078_VAR_00
data.value: Why don't you gallop with me? Going zoooooom gives you the best feeling!

data.name: TALK_REST_0079_VAR_00
data.value: My mind is empty...

data.name: TALK_REST_0080_VAR_00
data.value: Shellder just bit me!

data.name: TALK_REST_0081_VAR_00
data.value: Safety first! Pi-pi-pi!

data.name: TALK_REST_0082_VAR_00
data.value: Protecting the safety around here! Pi-pi-pi!

data.name: TALK_REST_0083_VAR_00
data.value: I guess I should go on an adventure from time to time.

data.name: TALK_REST_0084_VAR_00
data.value: Run like the wind! *pant pant*

data.name: TALK_REST_0085_VAR_00
data.value: Joy, sorrow, and rage... Three heads are in command!

data.name: TALK_REST_0086_VAR_00
data.value: Whaaaaat?

data.name: TALK_REST_0087_VAR_00
data.value: If you want to fight me, I'll just take a nap...

data.name: TALK_REST_0088_VAR_00
data.value: I'm sticky.

data.name: TALK_REST_0089_VAR_00
data.value: Can I depend on you?

data.name: TALK_REST_0090_VAR_00
data.value: Let me know if you see Slowpoke. I'll clamp my shell down on him.

data.name: TALK_REST_0091_VAR_00
data.value: My shell is really hard! I'd say rock hard!

data.name: TALK_REST_0092_VAR_00
data.value: My body's made of a gaseous material!

data.name: TALK_REST_0093_VAR_00
data.value: Muwuhaha! I'm Haunter! I'm an immortal ghost!

data.name: TALK_REST_0094_VAR_00
data.value: My name is Gengar! Good to see you, hee-hee!

data.name: TALK_REST_0095_VAR_00
data.value: I like digging! Let's make tunnels for fun!

data.name: TALK_REST_0096_VAR_00
data.value: I can eat dreams. How do they taste? Not bad.

data.name: TALK_REST_0097_VAR_00
data.value: Everyone should fall asleep with my Hypnosis!

data.name: TALK_REST_0098_VAR_00
data.value: I'm not good at rock-paper-scissors! *clip clip*

data.name: TALK_REST_0099_VAR_00
data.value: One scissor blade is a bit too heavy. *pant pant*

data.name: TALK_REST_0100_VAR_00
data.value: *zap za-a-a-ap*

data.name: TALK_REST_0101_VAR_00
data.value: Watch out! I sometimes explode.

data.name: TALK_REST_0102_VAR_00
data.value: We happen to be together by chance. That's all!

data.name: TALK_REST_0103_VAR_00
data.value: I'm from a warmer area. They often tell me I'm big-hearted!

data.name: TALK_REST_0104_VAR_00
data.value: I overcame sorrow to become strong!

data.name: TALK_REST_0105_VAR_00
data.value: I smack my enemies with a marvelous whack!

data.name: TALK_REST_0106_VAR_00
data.value: Don't underestimate my kick! I stretch myself every night!

data.name: TALK_REST_0107_VAR_00
data.value: *punch punch* Here goes nothing but punch!

data.name: TALK_REST_0108_VAR_00
data.value: I want to lick something... *lick*

data.name: TALK_REST_0109_VAR_00
data.value: I think I've stored quite a lot of gas.

data.name: TALK_REST_0110_VAR_00
data.value: Our era is finally here! Weez!

data.name: TALK_REST_0111_VAR_00
data.value: I'm clumsy, so I may become a burden. If that happens, I'm sorry.

data.name: TALK_REST_0112_VAR_00
data.value: I'll drill holes with my horn!

data.name: TALK_REST_0113_VAR_00
data.value: I like taking care of Eggs! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0114_VAR_00
data.value: What do you think is beneath all my thick tangles?

data.name: TALK_REST_0115_VAR_00
data.value: Taking care of the baby is a full-time job!

data.name: TALK_REST_0116_VAR_00
data.value: They all call me Bubbles. I wonder why. Do you think I horse around too much?

data.name: TALK_REST_0117_VAR_00
data.value: They call me Snooze-dra... You don't think I'm lazy, do you?

data.name: TALK_REST_0118_VAR_00
data.value: Don't you love my horn? Golly...

data.name: TALK_REST_0119_VAR_00
data.value: How do you like the pattern on my body? It's totally mesmerizing, isn't it?

data.name: TALK_REST_0120_VAR_00
data.value: I want to salvage treasures! Argh!

data.name: TALK_REST_0121_VAR_00

data.name: TALK_REST_0308_VAR_00
data.value: My body may be starving, but my mind is stronger than ever!

data.name: TALK_REST_0309_VAR_00
data.value: This is such a nice place.[br]The nice breeze helps me make electricity.

data.name: TALK_REST_0310_VAR_00
data.value: I discharge electricity from my mane.[pause=0] You should watch it.

data.name: TALK_REST_0311_VAR_00
data.value: Minun and I will cheer for you! Go!

data.name: TALK_REST_0312_VAR_00
data.value: Pump yourself up! Show me your guts! Look at me!

data.name: TALK_REST_0313_VAR_00
data.value: I like Illumise so much![pause=0] Finding one makes my rear end shine with joy!

data.name: TALK_REST_0314_VAR_00
data.value: I love creating beautiful night views with Volbeat. That's our hobby. \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0315_VAR_00
data.value: I should get out of the village. Don't we all need exercise?

data.name: TALK_REST_0316_VAR_00
data.value: I may be up for it today. I may not be... I'm not too sure myself...

data.name: TALK_REST_0317_VAR_00
data.value: Here comes a mouth wide open! Swalot!

data.name: TALK_REST_0318_VAR_00
data.value: I feel like sinking my teeth into things!

data.name: TALK_REST_0319_VAR_00
data.value: They call me the bully of the sea.[pause=0] Not too sure if I really AM a bully.

data.name: TALK_REST_0320_VAR_00
data.value: Look at me bounce like a ball!

data.name: TALK_REST_0321_VAR_00
data.value: Water splash!

data.name: TALK_REST_0322_VAR_00
data.value: They tell me I'm oblivious. You think so, too?

data.name: TALK_REST_0323_VAR_00
data.value: Errrrrruuuuupt!

data.name: TALK_REST_0324_VAR_00
data.value: I can't bathe in a hot spring, so I take a bedrock bath instead.

data.name: TALK_REST_0325_VAR_00
data.value: I want to sell my pearls in a dungeon.[pause=0] Do you think I'd do well?

data.name: TALK_REST_0326_VAR_00
data.value: I use black pearls to amplify my psychic power! Here I go!

data.name: TALK_REST_0327_VAR_00
data.value: I like traveling.

data.name: TALK_REST_0328_VAR_00
data.value: Hey! Can you place one of your feet into a nest I made in the desert?

data.name: TALK_REST_0329_VAR_00
data.value: I vibrate my wings rigorously all the time.[br]No, it's not restless-wing syndrome.

data.name: TALK_REST_0330_VAR_00
data.value: I can call sandstorms by flapping my wings!

data.name: TALK_REST_0331_VAR_00
data.value: I'm from the desert! Others like my sharp thorns! \u266A Thanks for having me along!

data.name: TALK_REST_0332_VAR_00
data.value: The sun goes down and comes up again. It shines like new every time...

data.name: TALK_REST_0333_VAR_00
data.value: Cotton Bird Pokmon, I am! My wings are fluffy like cotton!

data.name: TALK_REST_0334_VAR_00
data.value: I'm fluffy, aren't I? \u266A Do you want to feel how soft my wings are?

data.name: TALK_REST_0335_VAR_00
data.value: I'm Zangoose! My claws crush all!

data.name: TALK_REST_0336_VAR_00
data.value: Zangoose is my rival! The next time I see him, I'll...[pause=0] What should I do?

data.name: TALK_REST_0337_VAR_00
data.value: My chin's not turned up, you see? It's my body that's curled up. OK?

data.name: TALK_REST_0338_VAR_00
data.value: They think I look like the sun. I think so, too.

data.name: TALK_REST_0339_VAR_00
data.value: I'm Barboach! My body is slimy.

data.name: TALK_REST_0340_VAR_00
data.value: My name is Whiscash. I once ruled a pond. Hohoho. Do you want to hear about it?

data.name: TALK_REST_0341_VAR_00
data.value: Hey, hey! Where is my guildmaster?

data.name: TALK_REST_0342_VAR_00
data.value: A lone star shining on my head! Craw!

data.name: TALK_REST_0343_VAR_00
data.value: I'm from the ruins. Let me spin around.

data.name: TALK_REST_0344_VAR_00
data.value: Hey, I'm a mysterious Pokmon. I may be made of clay...[pause=0] I may not be.

data.name: TALK_REST_0345_VAR_00
data.value: I pretend to be seaweed to deceive foes.[pause=0] What? I look too obvious?

data.name: TALK_REST_0346_VAR_00
data.value: I sway at the bottom of the sea.[pause=0] Will you dance with me?

data.name: TALK_REST_0347_VAR_00
data.value: They say I used to be a fossil. That sounds cool! [pause=0]I'm flattered!

data.name: TALK_REST_0348_VAR_00
data.value: Huh? Do I enjoy exploration? Of course I do!

data.name: TALK_REST_0349_VAR_00
data.value: I want to become beautiful!

data.name: TALK_REST_0350_VAR_00
data.value: Let us proceed. The love I radiate calms everyone's heart.

data.name: TALK_REST_0351_VAR_00
data.value: I change my appearance with the weather! Cloud Nine, and I'm back to normal! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0352_VAR_00
data.value: Welcome! \u266A For one of my dearest customers, I'll do my best!

data.name: TALK_REST_0353_VAR_00
data.value: I can sense how others feel with my horn![pause=0] Are you a little jealous of my skill?

data.name: TALK_REST_0354_VAR_00
data.value: I feed off negative feelings.[br]I need a lot of those, actually.

data.name: TALK_REST_0355_VAR_00
data.value: Let's hoard our treasures forever!

data.name: TALK_REST_0356_VAR_00
data.value: Lost in the dusky darkness! Life is a winding road.

data.name: TALK_REST_0357_VAR_00
data.value: Would you like to try the fruit around my neck? It tastes good!

data.name: TALK_REST_0358_VAR_00
data.value: I like to ring my bell!

data.name: TALK_REST_0359_VAR_00
data.value: The sky and the ground are calling me. I sense something is about to happen...

data.name: TALK_REST_0360_VAR_00
data.value: I'm always full of smiles!

data.name: TALK_REST_0361_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: I like snow! Giiii giiii...

data.name: TALK_REST_0361_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: I always hop around with joy when it snows!

data.name: TALK_REST_0362_VAR_00
data.value: I can freeze anything!

data.name: TALK_REST_0363_VAR_00
data.value: It's fun to be round and roll around!

data.name: TALK_REST_0364_VAR_00
data.value: I've got the urge to spin something on the tip of my nose! I really need to give it a whirl!

data.name: TALK_REST_0365_VAR_00
data.value: I can take cold weather! I can take on young ones, too!

data.name: TALK_REST_0366_VAR_00
data.value: Look! I've managed to make pearls! Now I have to show them to Spoink!

data.name: TALK_REST_0367_VAR_00
data.value: Oh! You're on an expedition again? Such a hardworking team!

data.name: TALK_REST_0368_VAR_00
data.value: I'm beautiful, right? Behold my pink body! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0369_VAR_00
data.value: They say our kind has been like this for over 100 million years. So, what are we like?

data.name: TALK_REST_0370_VAR_00
data.value: Really? You came to see me?[pause=0] I feel loved...[pause=0] I'm blushing!

data.name: TALK_REST_0371_VAR_00
data.value: I want to fly through the sky! That's my dream!

data.name: TALK_REST_0372_VAR_00
data.value: I need to be patient! I'm stuck in this shell! I have to. I need to. It's a foregone conclusion!

data.name: TALK_REST_0373_VAR_00
data.value: Anyone who opposes me will be burned to a crisp![pause=0] That's just one possibility...

data.name: TALK_REST_0374_VAR_00
data.value: I'm made out of magnets![pause=0] ...What's a magnet?

data.name: TALK_REST_0375_VAR_00
data.value: I'm proud of my claws! I also like my nose!

data.name: TALK_REST_0376_VAR_00
data.value: Why is there a big X in the middle of my face?

data.name: TALK_REST_0377_VAR_00
data.value: I'm looking for new rocks. Did you see any good ones?

data.name: TALK_REST_0378_VAR_00
data.value: Apparently, I'm made of ice from ancient times. I don't remember that at all.

data.name: TALK_REST_0379_VAR_00
data.value: When I rub my body, it makes this really unpleasant metallic sound. You wanna try?

data.name: TALK_REST_0380_VAR_00
data.value: I'm glad I'm no longer stone! I'm so happy that I can fly again!

data.name: TALK_REST_0381_VAR_00
data.value: Thanks to everyone, I'm back from being stone. Thank you so much!

data.name: TALK_REST_0382_VAR_00
data.value: I'm the embodiment of the sea! I'll bring about storms to expand the ocean!

data.name: TALK_REST_0383_VAR_00
data.value: I'm Groudon, the embodiment of land! I raise the ground and clear away rain clouds!

data.name: TALK_REST_0384_VAR_00
data.value: I live high up in the sky, flying through the ozone layer for millions of years!

data.name: TALK_REST_0385_VAR_00
data.value: Occasional adventure isn't bad!

data.name: TALK_REST_0386_VAR_00
data.value: Focusing my mind on the crystalline organ on my chest, I can feel the power of space!

data.name: TALK_REST_0387_VAR_00
data.value: I feel great when the sun hits the twig on my head...

data.name: TALK_REST_0388_VAR_00
data.value: I'd rather live quietly in the forest.[pause=0] I prefer having a lake nearby.

data.name: TALK_REST_0389_VAR_00
data.value: We live with the forest and move as slowly as the forest.

data.name: TALK_REST_0390_VAR_00
data.value: Fire means that I'm fired up! I'm full of energy today!

data.name: TALK_REST_0391_VAR_00
data.value: I'm more playful than anyone else!

data.name: TALK_REST_0392_VAR_00
data.value: I'm a fiery martial artist! I deliver fast and furious infernos!

data.name: TALK_REST_0393_VAR_00
data.value: I hate it when they bother me. I want them to pamper me.

data.name: TALK_REST_0394_VAR_00
data.value: I'm the greatest Pokmon of all.[br]I'm not sure why I feel that way, but the idea plumps up my ego!

data.name: TALK_REST_0395_VAR_00
data.value: My strength is in my three horns! Hurt my friends, and you'll face my horns!

data.name: TALK_REST_0396_VAR_00
data.value: I've been traveling through various places.

data.name: TALK_REST_0397_VAR_00
data.value: Travel, adventure, expeditions... They are all similar in a sense. Exciting, aren't they?

data.name: TALK_REST_0398_VAR_00
data.value: I'm quite picky when it comes to the shape of my comb! Look at it! Cool, huh?

data.name: TALK_REST_0399_VAR_00
data.value: Yep, I'm stupid. But I still do my best.

data.name: TALK_REST_0400_VAR_00
data.value: Adventure? I may look dull, but don't you underestimate me!

data.name: TALK_REST_0401_VAR_00
data.value: Lovely tunes soothe everyone's heart. Music is wonderful!

data.name: TALK_REST_0402_VAR_00
data.value: Music is an explosion of self-expression!

data.name: TALK_REST_0403_VAR_00
data.value: Electricity? I can generate it easily!

data.name: TALK_REST_0404_VAR_00
data.value: I can let electric current flow through the tips of my claws. Do you want a taste of it?

data.name: TALK_REST_0405_VAR_00
data.value: Hiding behind things? There's no use! I can see through anything.[br]But I wouldn't stare at something I'm not supposed to.

data.name: TALK_REST_0406_VAR_00
data.value: When I go home, I wanna eat lots of snacks! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0407_VAR_00
data.value: Careful with the flowers, hun. They're toxic.

data.name: TALK_REST_0408_VAR_00
data.value: I have a thick head, but I enjoy when someone pats me on it.

data.name: TALK_REST_0409_VAR_00
data.value: I'm Rampardos! My hard head can bust through anything!

data.name: TALK_REST_0410_VAR_00
data.value: I don't like fighting much. We should all get along! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0411_VAR_00
data.value: Life is all about defense! No attacking!

data.name: TALK_REST_0412_00_VAR_00
data.value: I've gathered some of the plants from around here to wear. How do I look?

data.name: TALK_REST_0412_01_VAR_00
data.value: I've gathered some sand to wear. What do you think? Am I charming?

data.name: TALK_REST_0412_02_VAR_00
data.value: I've gathered some trash to wear... I had no choice! That's all I could find.

data.name: TALK_REST_0413_00_VAR_00
data.value: I can't get out of my plant cloak. Did I gain weight?

data.name: TALK_REST_0413_01_VAR_00
data.value: Sand is stuck all over my body, and I can't get rid of it! Eeek!

data.name: TALK_REST_0413_02_VAR_00
data.value: Know what? The trash I've been wearing is now stuck on me! What should I do?

data.name: TALK_REST_0414_VAR_00
data.value: I love the honey that Combee make!

data.name: TALK_REST_0415_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: Combining power is what we Combee do! We comb through all the possibilities!

data.name: TALK_REST_0415_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: Oh, we have to make Honey! Busy-busy!

data.name: TALK_REST_0416_VAR_00
data.value: I'm the queen of the hive.[pause=0] Our important task is making Honey.

data.name: TALK_REST_0417_VAR_00
data.value: My cheeks and tail go zap!

data.name: TALK_REST_0418_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: Huh? You wanna go on an expedition together? Sure!

data.name: TALK_REST_0418_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: When swimming, I use my tail like a propeller! Cool, huh?

data.name: TALK_REST_0419_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: I'm proud of my flotation sac, but... [pause=0] I wonder if I could swim without it.

data.name: TALK_REST_0419_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: Let me know if anyone's drowning! I'll come to the rescue right away!

data.name: TALK_REST_0420_VAR_00
data.value: I'm completely red from sunbathing! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0421_VAR_00
data.value: Peeka[pause=0]BOO![pause=0] That's what I like to do! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0422_00_VAR_00
data.value: Our bodies look different depending on where we're from. Where you come from counts!

data.name: TALK_REST_0422_01_VAR_00
data.value: I know some blame it on their upbringing.[pause=0] But anyone can overcome that, right?

data.name: TALK_REST_0423_VAR_00
data.value: My friends have a squishy body. I do, too.

data.name: TALK_REST_0424_VAR_00
data.value: I can manipulate anything with my tail. I have no use for my hands. Is that bad?

data.name: TALK_REST_0425_VAR_00
data.value: Drifting about... \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0426_VAR_00
data.value: Drifting around! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0427_VAR_00
data.value: How do you like my ears rolled up? \u266A Don't you just love them? \u2661

data.name: TALK_REST_0428_VAR_00
data.value: Let's adventure! Nothing's impossible when we're together! \u2661

data.name: TALK_REST_0429_VAR_00
data.value: Can I chant incantations? They may sound strange, but they'll make everyone happy! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0430_VAR_00
data.value: My name is Honchkrow! I'm the head honcho of all the Murkrow!

data.name: TALK_REST_0431_VAR_00
data.value: I'm self-centered, I'm high maintenance, and I run hot and cold. So, what do you think?

data.name: TALK_REST_0432_VAR_00
data.value: What? Overweight? Of course not! Where are your manners?

data.name: TALK_REST_0433_VAR_00
data.value: I make a ringing noise when I hop! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0434_VAR_00
data.value: I can produce this stinky gas from my...[pause=0] What? Stop right there? Okey doke.

data.name: TALK_REST_0435_VAR_00
data.value: Chaw-haw-haw!

data.name: TALK_REST_0436_VAR_00
data.value: Yep! I look like a mirror.

data.name: TALK_REST_0437_VAR_00
data.value: So, I've been sleeping for over 2,000 years?[pause=0] I guess I overslept a bit, didn't I?

data.name: TALK_REST_0438_VAR_00
data.value: I'm not crying! I'm only discharging excess fluid!

data.name: TALK_REST_0439_VAR_00
data.value: I love copycatting! Let me sing songs! The first one that I'll sing is called...

data.name: TALK_REST_0440_VAR_00
data.value: I really like things that are round and white! \u266A I just get so drawn to them. \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0441_VAR_00
data.value: Let's make music together! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0442_VAR_00
data.value: Hee-hee-hee! My name is Spiritomb! I was born from 108 spirits!

data.name: TALK_REST_0443_VAR_00
data.value: My mouth is big. My head is, too.

data.name: TALK_REST_0444_VAR_00
data.value: I like sparkly things! Maybe I should start a hoard...

data.name: TALK_REST_0445_VAR_00
data.value: I'm fast and strong!

data.name: TALK_REST_0446_VAR_00
data.value: Munchlax is hungry... Do you have anything to eat?

data.name: TALK_REST_0447_VAR_00
data.value: Feel and follow aura when lost.

data.name: TALK_REST_0448_VAR_00
data.value: Whatever the situation, aura will show you the way!

data.name: TALK_REST_0449_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: Jump, don't be a lump! Let's stay focused!

data.name: TALK_REST_0449_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: A dry environment is not good for your skin. But I like dry places!

data.name: TALK_REST_0450_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: I blast sand upward to create sandstorms!

data.name: TALK_REST_0450_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: Sand showers make me beautiful! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0451_VAR_00
data.value: I get joy out of stinging ambushes!

data.name: TALK_REST_0452_VAR_00
data.value: Blindspot? What blindspot?

data.name: TALK_REST_0453_VAR_00
data.value: My hands are soaked in poison... Meh-heh-heh!

data.name: TALK_REST_0454_VAR_00
data.value: Poisonous claw attacks are my specialty!

data.name: TALK_REST_0455_VAR_00
data.value: I lure out Pokmon with my sweet scent, and the rest is done by my charm! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0456_VAR_00
data.value: I'm absolutely stunning, don't you think? \u266A I get that a lot. \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0457_VAR_00
data.value: The patterns on my body flash in the deep sea. \u266A Do you want to see them?

data.name: TALK_REST_0458_VAR_00
data.value: What? Why does the pattern on my back look like a face? Yikes!

data.name: TALK_REST_0459_VAR_00
data.value: I love snow, so I live among snowy mountains. It's a beautiful place.

data.name: TALK_REST_0460_VAR_00
data.value: I like white things. I paint everything with white! My Blizzard will bury you!

data.name: TALK_REST_0461_VAR_00
data.value: My claws come out when I meet resistance!

data.name: TALK_REST_0462_VAR_00
data.value: The force is strong... my magnetic force that is!

data.name: TALK_REST_0463_VAR_00
data.value: Can I lick your food?[pause=0] No? Why not? *sigh*

data.name: TALK_REST_0464_VAR_00
data.value: I never miss what I aim for.

data.name: TALK_REST_0465_VAR_00
data.value: They say I should trim my vines. But then the tangles won't be free to grow!

data.name: TALK_REST_0466_VAR_00
data.value: Need a jolt? Gahaha!

data.name: TALK_REST_0467_VAR_00
data.value: I'll cook something burning hot with my bare hands!

data.name: TALK_REST_0468_VAR_00
data.value: Kiss! Kiss! Togekiss![pause=0] What do I need to do to get a kiss?

data.name: TALK_REST_0469_VAR_00
data.value: Buzz! [pause=0]What? I'm too noisy?[pause=0] Sorry...

data.name: TALK_REST_0470_VAR_00
data.value: I can clean the air by using photosynthesis! Ecology conscious, aren't I?

data.name: TALK_REST_0471_VAR_00
data.value: I can freeze the air around me.[br]No, I don't mean that I freeze others out.

data.name: TALK_REST_0472_VAR_00
data.value: I want to glide around the planet on the wind!

data.name: TALK_REST_0473_VAR_00
data.value: If you stay still, your body will freeze to the core. You should keep moving.

data.name: TALK_REST_0474_VAR_00
data.value: It seems a program added to me has some problems...[br]Can someone fix it for me?

data.name: TALK_REST_0475_VAR_00
data.value: Appreciate your having me along!

data.name: TALK_REST_0476_VAR_00
data.value: I have a question for you! What's growing under my nose, a mustache or nose hair?[br]I'll tell you the answer if I take a lot of damage!

data.name: TALK_REST_0477_VAR_00
data.value: Whether it's in our own or another world...[pause=0] it's always darkest before the dawn.

data.name: TALK_REST_0478_VAR_00
data.value: Your body's freezing! Let's see if I can make it colder! Tee-hee!

data.name: TALK_REST_0479_00_VAR_00
data.value: I like mischief! Haha!

data.name: TALK_REST_0479_01_VAR_00
data.value: I just went for it without thinking. Look at me! I'm hot! So hot!

data.name: TALK_REST_0479_02_VAR_00
data.value: Water is going round and round in a box! I wonder if I can clean something in it!

data.name: TALK_REST_0479_03_VAR_00
data.value: I'm a box now! I keep things cool! I can even create ice!

data.name: TALK_REST_0479_04_VAR_00
data.value: I went for it without thinking, and now I can create wind! Whoosh!

data.name: TALK_REST_0479_05_VAR_00
data.value: I think I can cut a lot of grass at once! Give me a garden, and I'll work hard!

data.name: TALK_REST_0480_VAR_00
data.value: I'm Uxie. They call me "The Being of Knowledge."

data.name: TALK_REST_0481_VAR_00
data.value: Feeling joyous or sad makes you realize that you are alive!

data.name: TALK_REST_0482_VAR_00
data.value: To decide to do something and follow through...[pause=0] Willpower is worthy of respect.

data.name: TALK_REST_0483_VAR_00
data.value: I'm a deity in control of time. I manage and preserve the flow of time!

data.name: TALK_REST_0484_VAR_00
data.value: I'm Palkia! I am a deity in charge of space. Grrrrooaaaarr!

data.name: TALK_REST_0485_VAR_00
data.value: *glob glob* Magma is melting my body! *glob glob*

data.name: TALK_REST_0486_VAR_00
data.value: They say I move really slowl

data.name: TALK_REST_0487_VAR_00
data.value: I live in another worldone on the reverse side of this world.

data.name: TALK_REST_0488_VAR_00
data.value: My name is Cresselia. I represent the crescent moon. I keep bad dreams away.

data.name: TALK_REST_0489_VAR_00
data.value: Pheeee! Pheeaaaann! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0490_VAR_00
data.value: I'm fine! I always manifest happiness!

data.name: TALK_REST_0491_VAR_00
data.value: Have you had nightmares on a moonless night? If you have, that was my doing.

data.name: TALK_REST_0492_VAR_00
data.value: My name is Shaymin. [pause=0]My flowers bloom when I sense gratitude!

data.name: TALK_REST_0493_VAR_00
data.value: I am Arceus. I am the existence within nothingness.[br]We and our universe are both nothing and something...[pause=0] Everything has two sides.

data.name: TALK_REST_0494_VAR_00
data.value: Ta-daaa! Victini's here!

data.name: TALK_REST_0495_VAR_00
data.value: I love sunlight! I feel great when I sunbathe!

data.name: TALK_REST_0496_VAR_00
data.value: Do you want to see how I use vines? It may be too fast for your eyes to follow!

data.name: TALK_REST_0497_VAR_00
data.value: Whatever you do, don't drag me down. OK?

data.name: TALK_REST_0498_VAR_00
data.value: Nothing beats roasted Berries, right? They are the best! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0499_VAR_00
data.value: The fire inside my body is...burning!

data.name: TALK_REST_0500_VAR_00
data.value: My fiery beard tells you I'm aggressive! Let me burn you to a crisp!

data.name: TALK_REST_0501_VAR_00
data.value: The scalchop on my stomach is really useful! How would I survive without it?

data.name: TALK_REST_0502_VAR_00
data.value: Double-scalchop technique! That's my style!

data.name: TALK_REST_0503_VAR_00
data.value: One quick draw of a seamitar is all I need to defeat any foe.

data.name: TALK_REST_0504_VAR_00
data.value: My cheek pouches can store lots of food! But I'd rather others keep their food separately.

data.name: TALK_REST_0505_VAR_00
data.value: Perhaps I could give a nice speech or two here...[br]...[pause=0]Or perhaps not.

data.name: TALK_REST_0506_VAR_00
data.value: You and me for an adventure? Sure!

data.name: TALK_REST_0507_VAR_00
data.value: I'm happy just to be with my grandkids. They keep me full of energy.

data.name: TALK_REST_0508_VAR_00
data.value: I can take cold weather, no problem. But summer...is a totally different matter.

data.name: TALK_REST_0509_VAR_00
data.value: Huh? You look pretty decent. Not as good as me though.

data.name: TALK_REST_0510_VAR_00
data.value: My charm is enough to knock out the teeth of any Pokmon! \u266A Figuratively, of course!

data.name: TALK_REST_0511_VAR_00
data.value: A nibble from the leaf on my head will let you fully recover! It has lots of vitamins, too.

data.name: TALK_REST_0512_VAR_00
data.value: I'll be shady! I'll be wild! That's my style!

data.name: TALK_REST_0513_VAR_00
data.value: Show me whatever you want to eat. I'll sear it in no time for you! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0514_VAR_00
data.value: Do I look lazy?[pause=0] Well, as a matter of fact, I AM lazy.

data.name: TALK_REST_0515_VAR_00
data.value: Watch me perform my specialty! Panpouring fountain!

data.name: TALK_REST_0516_VAR_00
data.value: Think and decide for yourself. After all, it's your adventure. And don't forget to have fun!

data.name: TALK_REST_0517_VAR_00
data.value: I believe that one day this world will be full of our hopes.

data.name: TALK_REST_0518_VAR_00
data.value: The mist from my forehead is full of dreams! \u266A Nothing to worry about, OK?

data.name: TALK_REST_0519_VAR_00
data.value: Lately, I feel that I'm becoming forgetful. Should I be worried?

data.name: TALK_REST_0520_VAR_00
data.value: I can't believe some of us have no sense of direction! But getting lost may be fun. \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0521_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: They can sometimes see through my intimidating head plumage. So what?

data.name: TALK_REST_0521_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: I may look below average, but I have skills!

data.name: TALK_REST_0522_VAR_00
data.value: Look at how my mane shines! Cool, huh?

data.name: TALK_REST_0523_VAR_00
data.value: When I run wild, you'll hear the sound of thunder![br]Don't ask me what it does...

data.name: TALK_REST_0524_VAR_00
data.value: I'd like to keep any rare ore I happen to find!

data.name: TALK_REST_0525_VAR_00
data.value: Orange crystal is fully charged! Here goes Boldore!

data.name: TALK_REST_0526_VAR_00
data.value: I may not look it, but I'm very timid! Gigaaahhhh...

data.name: TALK_REST_0527_VAR_00
data.value: These ultrasound waves from my heart-shaped nostrils convey my love! \u2661

data.name: TALK_REST_0528_VAR_00
data.value: I emit sound waves! My nose is heart-shaped, too! Whispers of love! *blush*

data.name: TALK_REST_0529_VAR_00
data.value: Adventures...sound exciting. *wibble*

data.name: TALK_REST_0530_VAR_00
data.value: My drilling arms are cool, you say?[pause=0] That's right! They all love my drilling arms!

data.name: TALK_REST_0531_VAR_00
data.value: Let me know when you don't feel well. I'm a doctor, you see?

data.name: TALK_REST_0532_VAR_00
data.value: Let me know if you want anything built! I'll work on it!

data.name: TALK_REST_0533_VAR_00
data.value: I'm good at breaking things! GURDUUURRRRRR!!!

data.name: TALK_REST_0534_VAR_00
data.value: No need for excess power to swing pillars. You only need to know how to do it right.

data.name: TALK_REST_0535_VAR_00
data.value: *hop hop*

data.name: TALK_REST_0536_VAR_00
data.value: Palpitoad palpated Palpitoad![pause=0] Palpitoad palpated palpable Palpitoad!

data.name: TALK_REST_0537_VAR_00
data.value: I'm vibrating the bumps on my head! Can you feel it?

data.name: TALK_REST_0538_VAR_00
data.value: Mental gymnastics all the way![pause=0] That's what I believe!

data.name: TALK_REST_0539_VAR_00
data.value: One-hit KO! That would be my ideal! Here I come!

data.name: TALK_REST_0540_VAR_00
data.value: My mom made this leafy outfit for me! Don't you just love it? \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0541_VAR_00
data.value: I can't take cold weather. It's freezing!

data.name: TALK_REST_0542_VAR_00
data.value: It's almost time to prepare dinner, but I'll do my best.

data.name: TALK_REST_0543_VAR_00
data.value: I'll take care of you all! Come on!

data.name: TALK_REST_0544_VAR_00
data.value: I can roll around like a wheel! But bumps on the road hurt me!

data.name: TALK_REST_0545_VAR_00
data.value: No holding back, no matter who I face! That's my style! We're gonna lock horns!

data.name: TALK_REST_0546_VAR_00
data.value: I shoot out cotton when I'm surprised. So please don't startle me, OK?

data.name: TALK_REST_0547_VAR_00
data.value: I'll ride whirlwinds forever and ever!

data.name: TALK_REST_0548_VAR_00
data.value: A nibble from a leaf on my head will refresh you! \u266A It'll taste very bitter, though.

data.name: TALK_REST_0549_VAR_00
data.value: My dream life would be to live surrounded by flowers! \u266A I love flowers so much! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0550_00_VAR_00
data.value: Those Blue-Striped Basculin... They make me so mad for some reason.

data.name: TALK_REST_0550_01_VAR_00
data.value: I cannot possibly forgive those Red-Striped Basculin![pause=0] Now why was that...

data.name: TALK_REST_0551_VAR_00
data.value: Foes in dungeons don't scare me! Come on!

data.name: TALK_REST_0552_VAR_00
data.value: What did you say? What do you need from me? I'll let you off the hook today.

data.name: TALK_REST_0553_VAR_00
data.value: I'm skipping my part-time job again! Wait, I've changed my mind!

data.name: TALK_REST_0554_VAR_00
data.value: My body is full of red-hot fire!

data.name: TALK_REST_0555_VAR_00
data.value: One punch would make any foe scream!

data.name: TALK_REST_0556_VAR_00
data.value: Up-tempo and rhythmical! \u266A Why don't you dance with me?

data.name: TALK_REST_0557_VAR_00
data.value: I'm looking for my ideal dwelling! My home sweet home!

data.name: TALK_REST_0558_VAR_00
data.value: I'm NOT edible.[pause=0] I'm simply not meant to be eaten.[pause=0] Do you understand?

data.name: TALK_REST_0559_VAR_00
data.value: I know a move that'll knock the skin outta you!

data.name: TALK_REST_0560_VAR_00
data.value: I'm crafty in how I bend the rules, so don't count on me too much!

data.name: TALK_REST_0561_VAR_00
data.value: We have been protecting the ancient grounds for generations.[br]That memory is still passed down.

data.name: TALK_REST_0562_VAR_00
data.value: So... What exactly is this mask that I'm holding?[br]It's really scary! Eeek!

data.name: TALK_REST_0563_VAR_00
data.value: [emote=special2]Adventure? Sounds awesome! Let me join you! Fwohohoho!

data.name: TALK_REST_0564_VAR_00
data.value: I can go real deep underwater!

data.name: TALK_REST_0565_VAR_00
data.value: I'm still fit for this! Let me get to it.

data.name: TALK_REST_0566_VAR_00
data.value: All right! Let us work on an expedition!

data.name: TALK_REST_0567_VAR_00
data.value: If you have time to fly, you'd better run with me!

data.name: TALK_REST_0568_VAR_00
data.value: I've been traveling in search of an unsanitary environment.

data.name: TALK_REST_0569_VAR_00
data.value: I like trash! Have you seen any trash lately?

data.name: TALK_REST_0570_VAR_00
data.value: I can disguise myself as so many different Pokmon! Amazed?

data.name: TALK_REST_0571_VAR_00
data.value: Let me show you an illusion.[pause=0] There, an imaginary vision!

data.name: TALK_REST_0572_VAR_00
data.value: We should all keep ourselves tidy. \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0573_VAR_00
data.value: I love getting gifts. \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0574_VAR_00
data.value: These ribbon-like feelers enhance my psychic power!

data.name: TALK_REST_0575_VAR_00
data.value: They call me the Witch of Punishment!

data.name: TALK_REST_0576_VAR_00
data.value: I can see your future in the stars...[br][emote=surprised]...No![pause=0]It can't be!

data.name: TALK_REST_0577_VAR_00
data.value: My body's very soft and bouncy. \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0578_VAR_00
data.value: They say I have two brains. I'm divided as to what that means.

data.name: TALK_REST_0579_VAR_00
data.value: Huh? Why is my body so soft?[pause=0] I myself want to know.

data.name: TALK_REST_0580_VAR_00
data.value: Let me tell you about my world travels. Travel can bring trouble, but I won't duck!

data.name: TALK_REST_0581_VAR_00
data.value: My wings can carry me for thousands of miles.

data.name: TALK_REST_0582_VAR_00
data.value: My breath is very cold. They appreciate it in the summer when it's hot. \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0583_VAR_00
data.value: "How cool and delicious you look," they say.[pause=0] But please don't eat me!

data.name: TALK_REST_0584_VAR_00
data.value: Deluxe vanilla is my middle name! I look yummy, right? But you can't eat me!

data.name: TALK_REST_0585_VAR_00
data.value: Let's go! We'll have fun!

data.name: TALK_REST_0586_VAR_00
data.value: My large horns show that I'm the leader of the herd. I try to be a good leader.

data.name: TALK_REST_0587_VAR_00
data.value: All right, then. Guess we've gotta give it our all again today!

data.name: TALK_REST_0588_VAR_00
data.value: I like to wear something on my head. \u266A[pause=0] Things like hats...helmets...[br]Even wigs are a blast!

data.name: TALK_REST_0589_VAR_00
data.value: My spears go whoosh![pause=0] *pierce pierce*

data.name: TALK_REST_0590_VAR_00
data.value: They think I look like something. I wonder what they have in mind...

data.name: TALK_REST_0591_VAR_00
data.value: I may not look it, but I'm good at dancing.[pause=0] Hey, don't you believe me?

data.name: TALK_REST_0592_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: I like to wrap my arms tightly around my partner, but maybe I should ease up a bit.

data.name: TALK_REST_0592_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: Tee-hee! Now that I'm holding you, I'll never let you go!

data.name: TALK_REST_0593_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: I like to sink! *blub blub*

data.name: TALK_REST_0593_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: The bottom of the ocean is such a calm place.

data.name: TALK_REST_0594_VAR_00
data.value: I drift in the ocean. I let the current decide where I go.

data.name: TALK_REST_0595_VAR_00
data.value: I can't generate electricity myself. Can someone give me some?

data.name: TALK_REST_0596_VAR_00
data.value: My web is charged with electricity! It'll shock you!

data.name: TALK_REST_0597_VAR_00
data.value: Don't disturb me.

data.name: TALK_REST_0598_VAR_00
data.value: Young ones behaving badly bring out my thorny side!

data.name: TALK_REST_0599_VAR_00
data.value: My gears are interlocking smoothly now! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0600_VAR_00
data.value: Minigear and I work together to attack!

data.name: TALK_REST_0601_VAR_00
data.value: Big Gear: Hey, charge energy for me! Minigear: OK, Big Gear. Will do!

data.name: TALK_REST_0602_VAR_00
data.value: I can only generate weak electricity. But I'll give it my all!

data.name: TALK_REST_0603_VAR_00
data.value: I elect to wrap myself around the foe, and then...[pause=0] *zzzzap*

data.name: TALK_REST_0604_VAR_00
data.value: I latch on to the foe with my sucker mouth, and then...[pause=0] *zzzzap*

data.name: TALK_REST_0605_VAR_00
data.value: My head is way too heavy...

data.name: TALK_REST_0606_VAR_00
data.value: Wherever I go, I'll give it my all! Yeeeem!

data.name: TALK_REST_0607_VAR_00
data.value: I'm imagining a Pokmon trembling in terror...[pause=0] How exhilarating!

data.name: TALK_REST_0608_VAR_00
data.value: They say my fire is made of the spirits of the fallen...[br]Scary, isn't it?[pause=0] Be afraid! Be very afraid!

data.name: TALK_REST_0609_VAR_00
data.value: [emote=normal]...[pause=0]Then I turned around.[br][emote=pain]And I saw flames! Flames everywhere![br][emote=surprised]EEEEEEEEK!

data.name: TALK_REST_0610_VAR_00
data.value: My tusks grow back stronger every time they break off! That's why I chew a lot when I eat!

data.name: TALK_REST_0611_VAR_00
data.value: Look at my tusks! Don't they look like airplane wings?[pause=0] But I can't fly...

data.name: TALK_REST_0612_VAR_00
data.value: Behold my awesome tusks![pause=0] Everyone is scared of my tusks!

data.name: TALK_REST_0613_VAR_00
data.value: They think I have a cold all the time, but that's not...ah-choo!

data.name: TALK_REST_0614_VAR_00
data.value: I stick my chin up high! Beartic am I!

data.name: TALK_REST_0615_VAR_00
data.value: I... I evaporate and disappear when my body temperature goes up too high!

data.name: TALK_REST_0616_VAR_00
data.value: Adventure? I can't turn down your invitation! I shall be on guard to meet foes!

data.name: TALK_REST_0617_VAR_00
data.value: A knight without shining armor enters the hall![pause=0] Is everything polished to perfection?

data.name: TALK_REST_0618_VAR_00
data.value: Well, I have to admit that it's because I'm so flat that everyone just steps on me.

data.name: TALK_REST_0619_VAR_00
data.value: Let's go! I'll use my fighting moves to deliver some swift kicks!

data.name: TALK_REST_0620_VAR_00
data.value: I have achieved perfect mastery of the martial arts. Would you like to see my moves?

data.name: TALK_REST_0621_VAR_00
data.value: Who's describing me as "prickly," again? I'm "craggy," not "prickly." Got it?

data.name: TALK_REST_0622_VAR_00
data.value: Go, go, Golett! That's my motto!

data.name: TALK_REST_0623_VAR_00
data.value: Cool? Thank you, but I'm not a super robot or anything like that. *clang*

data.name: TALK_REST_0624_VAR_00
data.value: Give Bisharp your absolute obedience, unless you want him to mince you.

data.name: TALK_REST_0625_VAR_00
data.value: Hi, kids! How are you?[pause=0] Say my name! Say, "Bisharp!" Ready?

data.name: TALK_REST_0626_VAR_00
data.value: [emote=normal]My fur protects me when I strike with a headbutt.[br][emote=happy]It doesn't hurt even a tiny bit![br][emote=pain]Ahaha![pause=0] Ahahahahahahaha...

data.name: TALK_REST_0627_VAR_00
data.value: I'm brave! I don't back down no matter who the opponent is![pause=0] I mean it!

data.name: TALK_REST_0628_VAR_00
data.value: I'm a sky warrior! I fight for my allies!

data.name: TALK_REST_0629_VAR_00
data.value: I'm not ready to let go of my posterior protector yet! I'm NOT too big for it!

data.name: TALK_REST_0630_VAR_00
data.value: What do you think of my bone collection? Fascinating, huh?

data.name: TALK_REST_0631_VAR_00
data.value: Hey, Durant! Come out, come out, wherever you are!

data.name: TALK_REST_0632_VAR_00
data.value: You didn't see Heatmor around here, did you? I'm so scared of him...

data.name: TALK_REST_0633_VAR_00
data.value: My eyes are covered, so I can't see a thing around me.

data.name: TALK_REST_0634_VAR_00
data.value: First head: Don't go that way! Second head: What? Where should we go?

data.name: TALK_REST_0635_VAR_00
data.value: I've got such a big appetite today!

data.name: TALK_REST_0636_VAR_00
data.value: They say that I'm too big to be a Bug type.[pause=0] They should just leave me alone!

data.name: TALK_REST_0637_VAR_00
data.value: I'm an embodiment of the sun![pause=0] I'll warm you up, everyone!

data.name: TALK_REST_0638_VAR_00
data.value: I will protect my friends with my steely body and mind!

data.name: TALK_REST_0639_VAR_00
data.value: I'll protect my friends no matter what, with all my might!

data.name: TALK_REST_0640_VAR_00
data.value: Hehe. Adventure's always fun, isn't it? Shall we go on?

data.name: TALK_REST_0641_VAR_00
data.value: I'm a legend who rides on divine winds to summon storms! Come forth, tempest!

data.name: TALK_REST_0642_VAR_00
data.value: My name is Thundurus![pause=0] I'm a legend, and I throw down lightning wherever I go!

data.name: TALK_REST_0643_VAR_00
data.value: I'm the true embodiment of flame! My blinding white flames will scorch everything!

data.name: TALK_REST_0644_VAR_00
data.value: I'm the ideal embodiment of lightning! My lightning will blacken and scorch the world!

data.name: TALK_REST_0645_VAR_00
data.value: I am the Guardian of the Fields! I am the one that nourishes the ground!

data.name: TALK_REST_0646_VAR_00
data.value: I know the coming of all things![br]I defeat without mercy anyone who would oppose that future!

data.name: TALK_REST_0647_VAR_00
data.value: Adventures are simply exciting![pause=0] I get to see all kinds of stuff!

data.name: TALK_REST_0648_VAR_00
data.value: Yes! The power of music is infinite! Come on! Sing with me!

data.name: TALK_REST_0649_VAR_00
data.value: What? Bothered by the cannon on my back?[pause=0] Don't worry! I won't use it on you!

data.name: TALK_REST_0650_VAR_00
data.value: The quills on my head won't hurt you! They are usually very soft.

data.name: TALK_REST_0651_VAR_00
data.value: No, I'm not horizontally challenged. I'm well built.

data.name: TALK_REST_0652_VAR_00
data.value: I can be the shield when foes' attacks become too much. Let's give it our all!

data.name: TALK_REST_0653_VAR_00
data.value: I can vent hot air from my ears. \u266A I don't need to eat anything spicy for that! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0654_VAR_00
data.value: Huh? You want to know why I have a twig stuck in my tail?[pause=0] Nonya!

data.name: TALK_REST_0655_VAR_00
data.value: I can manipulate flames...[pause=0] elegantly and mysteriously.

data.name: TALK_REST_0656_VAR_00
data.value: I secrete bubbles from my chest and back, but they aren't shampoo.

data.name: TALK_REST_0657_VAR_00
data.value: I throw rocks covered with bubbles. Don't call me a coward!

data.name: TALK_REST_0658_VAR_00
data.value: To live in the shadows cast by those who shine... That is the destiny of the ninja!

data.name: TALK_REST_0659_VAR_00
data.value: I'll give it my all! I can dig holes. Think that might come in handy during an adventure?

data.name: TALK_REST_0660_VAR_00
data.value: Leave it to me when it comes to civil engineering! Dig, dig, and dig some more!

data.name: TALK_REST_0661_VAR_00
data.value: It's fun to hang around in town. But adventure is fun, too!

data.name: TALK_REST_0662_VAR_00
data.value: Do as I say, or I'll shoot fire from my beak!

data.name: TALK_REST_0663_VAR_00
data.value: Don't get me too fired up! I'll produce fire from all over my body!

data.name: TALK_REST_0664_VAR_00
data.value: Everyone, I have to warn you not to attack me. I'll scatter black powder if you do!

data.name: TALK_REST_0665_VAR_00
data.value: I have no idea why, but...[pause=0] my fur's bristled!

data.name: TALK_REST_0666_VAR_00
data.value: Do you like the pattern on my wings? \u266A[pause=0] If you want a taste of my Powder, try saying no!

data.name: TALK_REST_0666_VAR_01
data.value: Try to surpass my beauty.

data.name: TALK_REST_0667_VAR_00
data.value: I ask for fights a lot! Huh? What did you say? You want a fight?

data.name: TALK_REST_0668_00_1_VAR_00
data.value: My fiery mane is the symbol of my royalty. I protect my pride!

data.name: TALK_REST_0668_00_2_VAR_00
data.value: We females hunt. Males aren't fit for it.

data.name: TALK_REST_0669_VAR_00
data.value: I draw upon the flowers with their hidden powers to follow me and serve me! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0670_VAR_00
data.value: Taking care of flowers is my duty. It can be hectic, but it's always fun! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0671_VAR_00
data.value: I happen to own a superb garden myself. Will you come visit me next time? Ohoho!

data.name: TALK_REST_0672_VAR_00
data.value: Hey, are you going somewhere fun?

data.name: TALK_REST_0673_VAR_00
data.value: I can help you if you need anything transported!

data.name: TALK_REST_0674_VAR_00
data.value: You want to go on an adventure with me? I guess we'll give it our all!

data.name: TALK_REST_0675_VAR_00
data.value: When someone asks for a fight, I always go for it. I never back down!

data.name: TALK_REST_0676_VAR_00
data.value: What? Can I see through the untidy fur on my forehead? Sure, I can! Leave me alone!

data.name: TALK_REST_0677_VAR_00
data.value: Try not to aim too high, or you'll get hurt. Relax and be yourself.

data.name: TALK_REST_0678_00_VAR_00
data.value: OK, what mischief can I get into today?

data.name: TALK_REST_0678_01_VAR_00
data.value: I can tell that you think I'm cute, right? Well, I think you are right.

data.name: TALK_REST_0679_VAR_00
data.value: I, Honedge, pledge to wedge an edge into a hedge on the ledge!

data.name: TALK_REST_0680_VAR_00
data.value: Whoever opposes me will face these double blades of mine!

data.name: TALK_REST_0681_VAR_00
data.value: They call me Gilbrand. It means shield and sword.

data.name: TALK_REST_0682_VAR_00
data.value: Here, smell me and be amazed!

data.name: TALK_REST_0683_VAR_00
data.value: What? I stink?[pause=0] Thank you. That's the highest compliment you could pay! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0684_VAR_00
data.value: Can we...go home by dinnertime?

data.name: TALK_REST_0685_VAR_00
data.value: I smell something yummy from over that way. *sniff sniff* \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0686_VAR_00
data.value: Oh no! I forgot something![pause=0] Oh well... Should be OK.

data.name: TALK_REST_0687_VAR_00
data.value: I hate being bothered! Don't make me spit ink!

data.name: TALK_REST_0688_VAR_00
data.value: Don't call us gross! We aren't gross at all!

data.name: TALK_REST_0689_VAR_00
data.value: Don't judge us by our looks.

data.name: TALK_REST_0690_VAR_00
data.value: I'm not Horsea's brother. We are friends. \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0691_VAR_00
data.value: How noxious! You are so noxious!

data.name: TALK_REST_0692_VAR_00
data.value: I have a water gun right in my arm! How cool is that? This is a dream come true for any kid!

data.name: TALK_REST_0693_VAR_00
data.value: I have a cannon in my arm! How cool is that?[pause=0] Just Inkay? No way! It's beyond OK!

data.name: TALK_REST_0694_VAR_00
data.value: I generate electricity while I sunbathe.[pause=0] This is called photovoltaic generation.

data.name: TALK_REST_0695_VAR_00
data.value: I generate electricity with my frills! I can feel power surging!

data.name: TALK_REST_0696_VAR_00
data.value: I'm widdle but stwong!

data.name: TALK_REST_0697_VAR_00
data.value: I'm really strong! Yes, I'm dead serious. Do I need to throw a tantrum to prove it?

data.name: TALK_REST_0698_VAR_00
data.value: I can't take hot weather. I hope cold days will hit us soon...

data.name: TALK_REST_0699_VAR_00
data.value: Let me know if you are too hot. I can create a cold breeze to cool you.

data.name: TALK_REST_0700_VAR_00
data.value: If anyone's about to have a fight, you need to come get me so I can stop them.[br]I can help them relax with my ribbonlike feelers.

data.name: TALK_REST_0701_VAR_00
data.value: Watch and learn from me! Here comes my aerial finishing move! Hy-krah! Hy-krah!

data.name: TALK_REST_0702_VAR_00
data.value: Adventure isn't where I shine the most, but I can go all out when eating!

data.name: TALK_REST_0703_VAR_00
data.value: Good morning. I've been sleeping underground for a long time.

data.name: TALK_REST_0704_VAR_00
data.value: Adventure? How exciting! I'll do my best!

data.name: TALK_REST_0705_VAR_00
data.value: How's your body? Is it nice and slimy like mine today?

data.name: TALK_REST_0706_VAR_00
data.value: Who's next? Whoever it is, I'll make you slimy!

data.name: TALK_REST_0707_VAR_00
data.value: I like Treasure Boxes! \u266A Let's go look for more! \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0708_VAR_00
data.value: I know how I look, but I'm not a ghost. There is no need to get startled.

data.name: TALK_REST_0709_VAR_00
data.value: I can control the trees of the forest.[pause=0] Huh? You want me to demonstrate?[pause=0] Well...

data.name: TALK_REST_0710_VAR_00
data.value: They think I look like something.[pause=0] I get that way too often, in fact.

data.name: TALK_REST_0711_VAR_00
data.value: Sing with me! You have to keep it nice and low so we can scare others! *cackle* \u266A

data.name: TALK_REST_0712_VAR_00
data.value: Ice encases my body. It's not as cold as you'd imagine.

data.name: TALK_REST_0713_VAR_00
data.value: I have a flat top. Do you want to take a ride?

data.name: TALK_REST_0714_VAR_00
data.value: I can emit ultrasonic waves from my ears! Can I do a show-and-tell now?

data.name: TALK_REST_0715_VAR_00
data.value: I'm the king of darkness! I'm invincible in the dark!

data.name: TALK_REST_0716_VAR_00
data.value: Let me share my lifethe life that flows in the Tree of Life! Let us venture into dungeons!

data.name: TALK_REST_0717_VAR_00
data.value: I'm the taker of lives! But I'll join your adventure, for now!

data.name: TALK_REST_0718_VAR_00
data.value: Zzeegggaa! I am the one who monitors the ecosystem of this planet.

data.name: TALK_REST_0719_VAR_00
data.value: I possess the beauty of gemstones! Try not to get jealous! \u266A

data.name: TALK_SHOP_0000
data.value: Always delighted to be of service! ~\u266A

data.name: TALK_SHOP_0001
data.value: Look, look! They're all shiny!

data.name: TALK_SHOP_0002

data.name: TALK_SHOP_END_0000
